result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Abraham W Reppert

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Order for reimbursement of GAL or Attorney

records.addlTxt: Affidavit of Services for Court appointed counsel and billing statement, received and filed, by Attorney Babe
Motion to forfeit bail granted.

Br. 1 Only
Code 1

Attorney Katie Elizabeth Babe in court.   Defendant Abraham W Reppert did not appear.   Lesli S Boese appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called at 2:24 - scheduled for 1:30.  This matter was rescheduled from last week.  Defendant commonly works out of state and Attorney Babe is not sure he received notification of the change.  Court orders capias.  Court orders bail revoked and forfeited.  Attorney Babe to wait 60 days before closing file.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 20, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant waives his/her right to a Preliminary Hearing.

Defendant Abraham W Reppert in court with attorney Katie Elizabeth Babe.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on May 22, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Abraham W Reppert in court with attorney Katie Elizabeth Babe.  Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attoney Babe requests an adjournment of the preliminary hearing for amended charges to be added.  State agrees with the request.  State to file amended complaint to be filed before May 15, 2015.  Time limits were previously waived.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 22, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on April 16, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Abraham W Reppert in court with attorney Katie Elizabeth Babe.  Debra Lynn Blasius appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Babe requests an adjourment.  No objection from the State.  Time limits were previously waived.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 16, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on March 13, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Katie Elizabeth Babe in court.   Defendant Abraham W Reppert did not appear.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary Hearing requested  Preliminary time limits waived.  Atty. Babe moves to dismiss count #1.  Court denies motion.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 13, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Hearing on February 11, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
Hearing on February 11, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Abraham W Reppert in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is requesting the court to appoint counsel. Court grants the request and the defendant is to reimburse the county at the rate of $100.00 per month to commence today and then every month thereafter on the 20th of each month.   Court tolled time limits for preliminary hearing for the status of counsel.  Hearing scheduled for February 11, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
Hearing on January 19, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Abraham W Reppert in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant stated he needs more time to obtain counsel.   Court tolled time limits for preliminary hearing.  Hearing scheduled for January 19, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
Hearing on December 22, 2014 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Abraham W Reppert in court.  Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court advises of right to an attorney. Defendant needs time to get counsel.   Court tolled time limits for preliminary hearing for the status of counsel. Court adjourns the matter.  Hearing scheduled for December 22, 2014 at 10:00 am.
Hearing on December 3, 2014 at 01:15 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Abraham W Reppert

Prior: 15322 South Kilbourn, Midlothian, IL 60445

Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness listed in the Criminal Complaint.  Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  Must provide current local address.

Defendant Abraham W Reppert in court, in custody.  Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Nicole Masnica appears as friend of the court.  Defendant is not eligible for State Public Defender representation.  Court tolled time limits for preliminary hearing.  Hearing scheduled for December 3, 2014 at 01:15 pm.
